title: Daily Shortwave Solar Irradiance - MSG
summary: Estimation of the solar irradiance reaching the Earth surface, derived from the geostationary satellite Meteosat, derived at present from the 0.6µm visible channel of SEVIRI, produced by remapping over a 0.05° regular grid and expressed in W/m2. The daily value is the integration of all the hourly values in the UT day.
